title: Joker's Wild
description: HE KIDNAPPED ME. HELD ME PRISONER. I knew Junior Tacone was dangerous. I worked for him once taking care of his mother.I thought when the job was over I’d be safe.Out of his awareness. Out of his reach.But his brother took a bullet and Junior picked me to be his nurse.So I’m his prisoner, trapped in his beautiful house, subject to his rule.And it seems he’s developed a thing for me.Which means he may never let me go...Note: This steamy stand-alone romance is the fifth in USA Today bestselling author Renee Rose's Vegas Underground series. No cheating, no cliffhangers.
author: Renee Rose
